name: Kitten Smack
description:
This Game was created  for the Geekjam 2018 at the Game Industry Conference in Poland in a 44-hour development time.

Kitten Smack is a rhythmic sidescroller set in a surreal world. You have to save a kitten by soundblasting it forward, or if you are evil, you also can smack it.

The theme of the Jam was to create a game for the PRES (Polish Experimental Radio Station) with a soundlibrary created by Eugeniusz Rudnik.


Happy Smacking!!!

Team Schnitzel:

Raphael Varga - Leveldesign (@Xamur2013 )

René Kielauer - Programming ( @dTimeRene)

Thomas Feichtmeir - Art ( @Cyangmou )

Vadim Kibardin - Sounddesign & Music ( no Twitter, iv4nd411@gmail.com )
